divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i just got done making love,sorry, but that's the truth,and i went down to the basement to throw clothes in dryer, and my wife started screaming. *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg) come up here.she was laying in bed,face in the window,she said it just came down,no noise,and hovered above the next door neighbors house.she said she could see lights underneath the ship,changing colors,but making no noise whatsoever.i have been with my wife for more than twenty years,have never known her to lie about anything,so i beleive her.to stress my point,i was skeptical at first,but i put two and two together.the dog was going crazy outside barking,when i looked,i didn't see anything,my wife said it just went straight up,no noise,nothing.when i got up the next morning,and looked outside,there was a brown circle ring across the backyard grass,big too.i should have called someone,and i regret it now.wouldn't that leave radiation levels or something?it is good to find somewhere to get this off my chest,over the years since, i have been hearing reports of sightings near nuclear plants,we were'nt too far from perry nuclear power plant.
